summary: Lets you choose between various different colors and styles of spell effects. Includes such things as blue lightning, less orange fire, clearer ice spikes, etc.
descriptionHtml: A simple mod to let you choose between various different styles of magic effects for your favorite spells. I made this mod simply because I thought the purplish nature of shock magic made me think too much about conjuration. I wanted something a bit more blue/white looking. So I made it, and while I was it I figured out how to do it to all the spells in the game. Therefor, instead of just making ALL spells willy-nilly, I'll be taking requests for a period of time. Purple lightning wasn't exactly the best fit for my hero, and lightning can actually come in many different colors. It's entirely realistic and "lore-friendly" depending on how much information exists in TES about lightning. For those of you who don't know, the color of the lightning we see depends entirely on the air the electricity is heating up and not the lightning itself.
author: SnipinCatz
